Name: Birth of a Hunter
About the game: Birth of a Hunter is a metroidvania style 2D platformer, with the twist that a huge new map is generated every time you start a new game. Get ready to explore different environments with their own dungeons to power yourself up and defeat bosses, all of which are randomly generated or selected. Features: A brand new map with brand new rooms randomly generated for each play-through A variety of randomly chosen Environments Dungeons Bosses And power ups to discover each new game. No two playthroughs will be the same! A resource management mechanic, where you must choose whether to allocate energy to health or ammo Four different unlockable difficulty levels to add extra challenges, including a roguelite mode Steam achievements The low price of free The personal touch and weird interesting bits that you might expect from a game made as a passion project by one person
